page.title: 02DOLPHIN LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: THE DOLPHIN LEISURE CENTRE THIS CENTRE IS HAYWARDS HEATH'S MAIN CENTRE<ABOUT 700 TO 1000 USE THE CENTRE EACH DAY. AFTER SWIMMING ,SQUASH IS THE MOST COMMON SPORT IN THE CENTRE. NEW SPORTS ARE HOPED TO TAKE PLACE IN AN EXTENSION TO BE BUILT ON. BUSINESS HAS GONE UP IN THE NEW YEAR. NOW IN HAYWARDS HEATH ABOUT 1000 CHILDREN ARE HAVING SWIMMING LESSONS. THE POOLS ARE MOST POPULAR ON SUNDAYS .AT THE CENTRE MORE MEN PLAY SQUASH THAN WOMEN. 17 DIFFERENT SCHOOLS USE THE FACILITIES AT THE CENTRE EACH WEEK. AT THE CENTRE THERE ARE 14 FULL TIME STAFF AND 8 PART TIME STAFF. THE LEISURE CENTRE WAS BUILT IN 1974_1975 BUT DUE TO BAD WEATHER IT WASN OPENED A LITTLE LATE ON MAY 8 1976.
